entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy after midnight. Wind north 30 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Wednesday 19 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Clearing. High plus 3.
